sentences.sContent: So when she broke the machine, she started making calls to sewing machine repair shops.
sentences.sCn: 所以在她把它弄坏时，她开始打缝纫机修理店的电话。

sentences.sContent: As if to prove her point, Wirasinghe brings out the rusted shell of an electric sewing machine.
sentences.sCn: 蚀了的电动缝纫机外壳，就好像要证明她话中的含义似的。

sentences.sContent: We put these specs on him, and he smiled, and threaded his needle, and sped up with this sewing machine.
sentences.sCn: 我们把这些眼镜给他戴上，他就笑了，然后开始给他的针穿线，并在缝纫机上飞速工作。
